data.name: Earth
data.description: Earth is the third planet from the Sun and the only astronomical object known to harbor life. While large volumes of water can be found throughout the Solar System, only Earth sustains liquid surface water. About 71% of Earth's surface is made up of the ocean, dwarfing Earth's polar ice, lakes, and rivers.

curiosities.news: Our home, Earth, is the third planet from the sun and the only world known to support an atmosphere with free oxygen, oceans of liquid water on the surface and life.
You may feel like you're standing still, but you're constantly  moving â€” fast, around 1000 miles per hour.
The Earth isn't just spinning: It's also moving around the sun at 67,000 miles (107,826 km) per hour.
